entry.title: WELCOME TO THE IMC CONTENT PORTAL

m:properties.d:Title: WELCOME TO THE IMC CONTENT PORTAL
m:properties.d:Body: For more information, click the "Help" button from the Main Page.

m:properties.d:Title: Holiday Toolkit Update
m:properties.d:Body: Please be advised that radio spots as well as TV spots (for Non-Broadcast use) have been added to the Holiday Toolkit on the IMC Content Portal. Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Truck Back Template Toolkit
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that truck back templates are now available via the IMC Content Portal. The Truck Back Toolkit can be found under the FLEET category.
Please note, that the Logo Only templates are being uploaded to Design Machine. If you have an immediate need, please contact Finished Art to customize with a partner logo. The logo only templates should be available on DM in approximately 2 weeks.
Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Ski Toolkit is Live
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that the Ski/Winter Sports toolkit is now available via the IMC Content Portal under the Sports category.
Please note, creative files are currently being posted to Design Machine, but may not be live until after the new year. If creative is needed immediately, please contact Finished Art to order.
Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Updated Music Toolkit
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that an updated Music toolkit is now available via the IMC Content Portal.
While a majority of the creative is available on Design Machine, there are a few elements that are still in process of being posted. If those elements are needed before they are live on Design Machine, please contact Finished Art to order.
Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Aquarium Toolkit
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that an updated Aquarium toolkit is now available via the IMC Content Portal.
https://teams.coca-cola.com/sites/toolkit/portal/index.html
Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Baseball Toolkit Updates
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that the Baseball toolkit has been updated with new Retail POS elements. You can access the toolkit via the IMC Content Portal. https://teams.coca-cola.com/sites/toolkit/portal/index.html
The new POS creative can currently be ordered through Finished Art and will also be available at 2B Design on 1/25. The templates will be made available on Design Machine, but exact timing is TBD. We will provide an update on Design Machine timing as soon as it is available.
Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Soccer Toolkit
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that the Soccer toolkit is now available via the IMC Content Portal under the Sports category. https://teams.coca-cola.com/sites/toolkit/portal/index.html
Please note, creative files are currently being posted to Design Machine and should be available by 2/1. If creative is needed immediately, please contact Finished Art to order.
Thank you.

m:properties.d:Title: Updated Basketball Toolkit
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that updated Sprite Basketball creative is now available in the Pro Basketball toolkit on the IMC Content Portal. https://teams.coca-cola.com/sites/toolkit/portal/index.html
Please note that while the files are being uploaded to Design Machine, creative can be ordered through Finished Art.
Thank you.

entry.title: Zoo and American Idol Toolkits Added

m:properties.d:Title: Zoo and American Idol Toolkits Added
m:properties.d:Body:
Please be advised that an updated Zoo toolkit, as well as the 2013 American Idol Program toolkit are now available on the IMC Content Portal.
https://teams.coca-cola.com/sites/toolkit/portal/index.html
Thank you.
